statements: SELECT * FROM agroforestry_products_inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM agroforestry_products_inventory;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM agroforestry_products_inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_products_inventory WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM agroforestry_products_inventory WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_products_inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM agroforestry_products_inventory WHERE product_description LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM agroforestry_products_inventory WHERE inventory_level < 100 OR price < 20 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(inventory_level) AS max_inventory FROM agroforestry_products_inventory;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM agroforestry_products_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, total_amount FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 AND quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM sales INNER JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE sales.quantity_sold > inventory.quantity ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE available_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity, price FROM Inventory JOIN Sales ON Inventory.product_id = Sales.product_id WHERE Sales.quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE LENGTH(phone_number) > 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, sale_date, amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT team_name, region FROM SalesTeam ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE amount > 500.00 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT id, team_name FROM SalesTeam WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT c.name, s.team_name FROM Collaborators c JOIN SalesTeam s ON c.sales_team_id = s.id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Product ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE date_added >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM Product WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, product_description, price, quantity FROM Product WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' OR product_description LIKE '%fresh%' ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory JOIN Product ON Inventory.product_id = Product.product_id WHERE Inventory.quantity > Product.quantity ORDER BY Inventory.date_added ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM Customer c JOIN Order o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
